content: Bitcoin Magazine Issue 1 - Own a piece of Bitcoin history!May 2012Graded 8.5 by CGCRetails for $2,100 (0.078 BTC) ungradedhttps://store.bitcoinmagazine.com/products/bitcoin-magazine-issue-1-may-2012STARTING BID: 0.01 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.005END TIME: MAY 18, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bidPAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC to address provided to winner via PM (I will not contact you on any other platform!)SHIPPING: Based on location and preference (Buyer pays estimated shipping)

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Wow, can't remember a graded one for auction the last few years. Not familiar with magazine grading? It's just a 1 - 10 scale?Probably out of my budget range soon, but can't hold back for now:0.025
